pkgmetadata.longdescription: Setup-----Setup package # python setup.py installExamples--------```pythonimport pararamioclient = pararamio.Pararamio('username', 'passowrd', 'two_factor_key')client.authenticate()ua = client.search_user('recipient@example.com')if len(ua) == 1: ua[0].send_message(text='text message')```
